import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{getNoteById,updateNote,deleteNote}from'../../services/notesService';import{getAllUsers}from'../../services/userService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MinuteNoteDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[note,setNote]=useState(null);const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[selectedAttendees,setSelectedAttendees]=useState([]);const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);const[editedContent,setEditedContent]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();// Fetch note and users
